txt.en: Boars can be found in Laerlad in the Vales of Anduin.\n\nYou should collect boar meat for the Woodfolk of Blómgard.

'Perhaps my wife Odahild has told you that the numbers of those who dwell in Blómgard dwindle year by year? Soon there will not be enough of us to defend the village, nor enough to hunt for food. In better times our hunters ranged the woods for boar meat, and it was enough. Can I ask you to brave the woods of Laerlad and return with boar meat for my village?'
The Woodmen of Blómgard have been unable to hunt in the woods due to a rise in the number of vicious beasts that lurk within.
Evorik can be found in Blómgard.\n\nYou should talk to Evorik.

'Your kindness fills my heart, but more than that: the food you have brought will fill my stomach and those of the village! It is not often we see such charity from strangers, and I am happy to know it has not vanished in the darkness of these days.'
Bring the boar meat to Evorik
